description.problem: Icon field extraction failing for some nodes, resulting in empty string
description.impact: LOW - Visual metadata missing, but doesn't affect functionality documentation
description.distribution:
131 files: icon=""
641 files: icon="file:nodename.svg" or similar (correct)
description.root_cause: Icon extraction regex not handling all icon format variations, especially for versioned nodes where icon is in versionDescription
description.fix_approach:
1. Improve icon field extraction regex
2. Check both .node.ts file AND versionDescription.ts
3. Handle different icon formats: file:, svg:, fa:, object format with light/dark
4. Priority: Low (nice to have, not critical for AI training)
